content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (21, 18), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母の初期位置は左上(3,3)近傍のランダムなため、まずは北東方向の索敵を行う必要がある。自軍空母BC1は索敵範囲が4ヘクスと狭いため、BSQ1とBSQ2を発艦して広範囲の索敵を行う。索敵結果から敵空母の位置を特定し、その後の攻撃計画を立てる。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 15, "y": 5}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (15, 5) while at (20, 17).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (21, 18), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (20, 17), outbound toward (15, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1は目標地点(15,5)に向かって索敵を行っているが、まだ敵空母を発見できていない。自軍空母BC1の索敵範囲が狭いため、BSQ2を発艦して別の方向から索敵を行う。BSQ1が目標地点に到達した後、敵空母を発見できなければ帰還するため、BSQ2の索敵結果を待つ必要がある。敵空母の位置を特定できれば、両航空部隊で攻撃を行う計画を立てる。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 5, "y": 15}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (5, 15) while at (20, 18).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (21, 18), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (18, 13), outbound toward (15, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (20, 18), outbound toward (5, 15), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1は目標地点(15,5)に向かって索敵を続けているが、まだ敵空母を発見できていない。一方、BSQ2は新たな目標地点(5,15)に向かって索敵を行っている。BSQ2の索敵結果を待つことで、敵空母の位置を特定できる可能性がある。敵空母の位置が分かれば、両航空部隊で集中攻撃を行う計画を立てる。自軍空母BC1は索敵範囲が狭いため、引き続き航空部隊の索敵に頼らざるを得ない。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (21, 18), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (16, 9), outbound toward (15, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (16, 18), outbound toward (5, 15), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1とBSQ2の索敵が進行中ですが、まだ敵空母の位置を特定できていません。自軍空母BC1の索敵範囲が狭いため、引き続き航空部隊に頼らざるを得ません。BSQ1とBSQ2が目標地点に到達した後、敵空母を発見できなければ帰還するため、次のターンまで待つ必要があります。敵空母の位置が分かれば、両航空部隊で集中攻撃を行う計画を立てます。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (15, 7) while at (15, 5).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (13, 15) while at (12, 18).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is returning to the carrier while at (15, 5).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (13, 15) (previously at (12, 14)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (15, 7) (previously at (13, 6)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (21, 18), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (15, 5), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (12, 18), outbound toward (5, 15), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1の索敵で敵航空部隊ASQ2を発見し、BSQ2の索敵でASQ1を発見しました。しかし、依然として敵空母の位置は不明です。次のターンでBSQ2が目標地点(5,15)に到達すれば、そこから広範囲の索敵が可能になるため、敵空母の位置を特定できる可能性があります。その後、両航空部隊で敵空母への集中攻撃を行う計画を立てます。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 6 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (14, 16) while at (11, 18).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy carrier(AC1) at (11, 9) while at (16, 9).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (19, 7) while at (16, 9).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (11, 9) (previously at (11, 9)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (14, 16) (previously at (12, 14)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (19, 7) (previously at (13, 6)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (21, 18), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (16, 9), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (8, 17), outbound toward (5, 15), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "このターンで、BSQ1が敵空母AC1の位置を発見しました。また、BSQ2の索敵でASQ1の位置も特定できました。敵空母AC1の位置が分かったため、次のターンではBSQ1とBSQ2を発艦して敵空母への攻撃を行う計画を立てます。BSQ1は敵空母AC1を、BSQ2は敵航空部隊ASQ1を攻撃するよう指示します。これにより、敵空母を撃沈し勝利を目指します。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 11, "y": 9}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. Currently, all air squadrons are deployed on missions, and there are no squadrons aboard the carrier. Orders cannot be issued to squadrons that are already deployed.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "申し訳ありません。現在、全ての航空部隊が任務中で、空母に搭載されている部隊がないため、新たな発艦命令を出すことができません。次のターンでは、帰還してきた航空部隊を再び発艦して敵空母への攻撃を行う計画を立てます。今のところ、自軍空母BC1の移動のみ指示することができます。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 11, "y": 9}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 7 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (20, 7) while at (17, 10).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (20, 17) while at (20, 16).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (20, 17) while at (18, 13).
- your squadron(BSQ2) is returning to the carrier while at (5, 15).

- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (20, 7) (previously at (13, 6)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:

- Your squadron BSQ1: position (18, 13), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (5, 15), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "このターンでは、自軍空母BC1が敵空母AC1の位置(11,9)に向けて移動しています。一方、BSQ1とBSQ2は帰還中です。次のターンでBSQ1とBSQ2が空母に戻ってきたら、両航空部隊を発艦して敵空母AC1と敵航空部隊ASQ1、ASQ2への攻撃を行う計画を立てます。敵空母AC1を撃沈できれば勝利に近づくことができます。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 11, "y": 9}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.
